pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multistage Sampling Allocation and Sample Selection // Multivariate optimal allocation for different domains in one and two stages stratified sample design. R2BEAT extends the Neyman (1934) Tschuprow (1923) allocation method to the case of several variables, adopting a generalization of the Bethels proposal (1989).R2BEAT develops this methodology but, moreover, it allows to determine the sample allocation in the multivariate and multi-domains case of estimates for two-stage stratified samples. It also allows to perform both Primary Stage Units and Secondary Stage Units selection. This package requires the availability of ReGenesees, that can be installed from https://github.com/DiegoZardetto/ReGenesees.
